column4: how do I run fsck in rescue mode? when i type "fsck" i just get the fsck version number
how do I run fsck in rescue mode? when i type "fsck" i just get the fsck version number
like arand said, but instead of # you type a digit to identify the partition
what partition do you want to check?
please check, type mount and read the output
if you just want to see the permissions : ls -l
